title-page.h3: I fill the web with quality.
title-page.p: I’m a software engineer based in Warsaw, Poland specializing in building web applications, websites and everything in between.

about-me.p:nth-child(1): I’m Dawid, a software developer based in Warsaw, Poland
about-me.p:nth-child(2): I’m studying Computer Science at WULS in Warsaw (3rd year). I enjoy creating content which can be visible on the Internet - websites, web applications and other digital content.
about-me.p:nth-child(3): Currently I work for Atinea as a full-stack developer. I gained here a lot of experience during the development of an enterprise appliaction used by an automotive company.
about-me.p:nth-child(4): My goal is to constantly make progress and learn new things. Every project is unique and brings new challenges to face.

contact.p: But if you would like to ask me about something or offer me a job - don’t hesitate to mail me. I will response as soon as it is possible.
